I Want: Be able to create a tag
For: So I can add it when I create a post
Acceptance Terms: Only logged public users must be able to create a new tag
Must be in the form to create new post
Must be inside of an main category
Main categories must not be allowed to be created
Must be capable to add the new tag to any post

For: Undo a tag I do not want
Acceptance Terms: Can only delete those tags I created
Can only delete those tags are not in use in some post

For: See only those tags that include a determinated tag
Acceptance Terms: Can only delete those tags I created
Can only delete those tags are not in use in some post
